replies.author: @Erkis2020
replies.text:
Here is the complete list of every lie Trump told during his debate with President Biden on Thursday (provided by the Biden-Harris campaign):

1. "We had the greatest economy in the history of our country. We have never done so well, and everybody was amazed by it."

2. "The only jobs he created are for illegal immigrants and bounce-back jobs, they‚Äôre bounced back from the COVID."

3. "[10% universal tariff proposal is] not going to drive [prices] higher.‚Äù

4. ‚Äú[Tariff proposal is] just going to just force [other countries] to pay us a lot of money.‚Äù

5. ‚ÄúI gave you the largest tax cut in history.‚Äù

6. "I was getting out of Afghanistan, but we're getting out with dignity, with strength, with power.‚Äù

7. ‚ÄúThe tax cuts spurred the greatest economy that we've ever seen.‚Äù

8. ‚ÄúNow, when we cut the taxes‚Ä¶we took in more revenue with much less tax.‚Äù

9. ‚ÄúWe had largely fixed [COVID].‚Äù

10. ‚ÄúThroughout the entire world, we're no longer respected as a country. They don't respect our leadership. They don't respect the United States anymore. We're like a third world nation.‚Äù

11. ‚ÄúHe allowed millions of people to come in here from prisons, jails, and mental institutions to come into our country and destroy our country.‚Äù

12. ‚ÄúHe's destroying Medicare because all of these people are coming in.‚Äù

13. ‚ÄúThe Supreme Court just approved the abortion pill.‚Äù

14. ‚ÄúEvery legal scholar throughout the world, the most respected, wanted [abortion] brought back to the states.‚Äù

15. ‚ÄúThey‚Äôre radical because they will take the life of a child in the eighth month, the ninth month, and even after birth. After birth, if you look at the former governor of Virginia, he was willing to do this. He said, we'll put the baby aside, I will determine what we do with the baby, meaning will kill the baby.‚Äù

16. ‚ÄúUnder Roe v. Wade, you have late term abortion. You can do whatever you want depending on the state. You can do whatever you want.‚Äù

17. ‚ÄúHe decided to open up our border, open up our country to people that are from prisons, people that are from mental institutions, insane asylum, terrorists.‚Äù

18. ‚ÄúHe didn't need legislation because I didn't have legislation. I said close the border.‚Äù

19. ‚Äú[Migrants are] living in luxury hotels in New York City and other places.‚Äù

20. ‚ÄúHe doesn't care about our veterans. He doesn‚Äôt care. He doesn‚Äôt like the military at all, and he doesn't care about our veterans.‚Äù

21. ‚ÄúI had the highest approval rating for veterans taking care of the VA. He has the worst. He's gotten rid of all the things that I approved.‚Äù

22. ‚ÄúFirst of all, that was a made-up quote, ‚Äòsuckers and losers.‚Äô They made it up.‚Äù

23. ‚ÄúOur veterans and our soldiers can't stand this guy. They can't stand him. They think he‚Äôs the worst Commander in Chief, if that‚Äôs what you call him, that we‚Äôve ever had.‚Äù

24. ‚ÄúHe did nothing to stop [Russia‚Äôs invasion of Ukraine]. In fact, I think he encouraged Russia from going in.‚Äù

25. "Iran was broke with me. I wouldn't let anybody do business with them. They ran out of money. They were broke.‚Äù

26. ‚ÄúYou had no terror at all during my administration.‚Äù

27. ‚ÄúNancy Pelosi, if you just watched the news from two days ago, on tape to her daughter, who's a documentary filmmaker they say, but she's saying, ‚ÄòOh, no, it's my responsibility. I was responsible for this‚Äô because I offered them 10,000 soldiers or National Guard. And she turned them down.‚Äù

28. ‚ÄúThe unselect committee, which is basically two horrible Republicans that are all gone now, out of office, and Democrats, all Democrats, they destroyed and deleted all the information they found because they found out we were right. We were right. And they deleted and destroyed all of the information.‚Äù

29. ‚ÄúTelling the Ukrainian people that we're going to want a billion dollars or you change the prosecutor, otherwise you're not getting a billion dollars. If I ever said that, that's quid pro quo.‚Äù

30. ‚ÄúI didn't have sex with a porn star.‚Äù

31. ‚ÄúHe basically went after his political opponent because he thought it was going to damage me.‚Äù

32. ‚ÄúHe made up the Charlottesville story.‚Äù

33. ‚ÄúHe caused the inflation and it's killing Black families and Hispanic families.‚Äù

34. ‚ÄúThey can‚Äôt buy groceries anymore, they can't, you look at the cost of food where it's doubled and tripled and quadrupled. They can‚Äôt live, they‚Äôre not living anymore.‚Äù

35. ‚Äú[European countries] don‚Äôt want anything that we have.‚Äù

36. ‚ÄúAlmost every police group in the nation from every state is supporting Donald J. Trump. Almost every police group.‚Äù

37. ‚ÄúAnd what he's done to the black population is horrible, including the fact that for ten years he called them super-predators.‚Äù

38. ‚ÄúAnd yet during my four years, I had the best environmental numbers ever.‚Äù

39. ‚ÄúThe Paris accord was going to cost us $1 trillion and China nothing and Russia, nothing, and India nothing. It was a rip off of the United States and I ended it because I didn't want to waste that money because they treated us horribly‚Ä¶. Nobody else was paying into it and it was, it was a disaster.‚Äù

40. ‚ÄúI'm the one that got the insulin down for the seniors. I took care of the seniors.‚Äù

41. On migrants: ‚ÄúThey're taking over our schools our hospitals, and they're going to be taking over our schools or hospitals, and they're going to be taking over Social Security.‚Äù

42. ‚ÄúBut Social Security - he's destroying it because millions of people are pouring into our country and they are putting them onto Social Security. They‚Äôre putting them onto Medicare, Medicaid. They‚Äôre putting them in our hospitals.‚Äù

43. ‚ÄúHe wants open borders. He wants our country to either be destroyed, or he wants to pick up those people as voters.‚Äù

44. "He wants the Trump tax cuts to expire.‚Äù

45. ‚ÄúHe wants to raise your taxes by four times. He wants to raise everybody‚Äôs taxes by four times.‚Äù

46. ‚ÄúWe now have the largest [trade] deficit in the history of our country under this guy. We have the largest deficit with China.‚Äù

47. ‚ÄúHe gets paid by China. He's a Manchurian candidate. He gets money from China. So I think he‚Äôs afraid to deal with them.‚Äù

48. ‚ÄúWe had two cases, we paid $6 billion for five people.‚Äù

49. ‚ÄúThey talk about a relatively small number of people that went to the Capitol, and in many cases were ushered in by the police.‚Äù

50. ‚ÄúI would have much rather accepted these [election results in 2020], but the fraud and everything else was ridiculous.‚Äù

replies.text:
‚Äã@laserlobotomy I already posted my long list, looks like YT deleted it. Let me rewrite it out for ya. Not like you're actually going to accept it even if I give you A DOZEN. I know this is pointless but the fact is, Trump lies quite literally in almost every single statement he made. It's either a straight up lie, a misrepresentation, some BS he's been saying for years that's long been proven untrue, or is simply misleading. Biden had quite a few slightly un-true statements as well. Just not even close to as many and all were based in truth, he just got the numbers wrong. Probably because he's too freakin old. For Trump, it's instinctual. 

Trump insinuated Biden is a Manchurian candidate being paid by China. He also asserted Biden got a cut from Hunter's payments from that Chinese energy company. Even if true, which isn't unbelievable, there's NO PROOF.
He claims Biden wants to raise taxes by 400%. In reality, taxes only go up in Biden's plan for one's who make over $400k. And it's not by 400%
He claims undocumented are being put on Social Security, Medicare and Medicaid under Biden. Not true. In fact, they pay in but never receive the benefits. It's not like that's legal, even if it is happening in small numbers through fraud.
Food has doubled, tripled, or quadrupled. I'm not sure it's even doubled outside of rare items. And that's not related to inflation, but I think articles say 50% of recent price rises are simply corporate profit. Trump isn't any more prone than Biden to fight the corps for scalping a national tragedy.
I had the best environmental numbers ever. Not true. At least until his last year during Covid, which of course CO2 emissions were down. So, it's misleading. In reality he gutted Clean Air Act and got rid of 100 environmental regulations.
He claims Biden calls blacks super-predators. He's been doing this for a while but that was Clinton who said that... in 1996 in reference to black youths in gangs and drug dealing. We all know this is an issue. But Biden never said that.
Claims he had the best immigration numbers. In reality, immigration slightly dropped his first year, rose again, dropped just as Covid hit and then exploded his last few months of office during covid (in comparison to Obama)
Claims he ended catch and release at the border. Not true, just by simple virtue of not having enough cells we still do catch and release. Even if he wanted to end this, he didn't and took the lazy way out of just getting a talking point.
Claims 18 million illegals came in. Stats don't support that. There were only 11.4 million encounters total under Biden, estimated 4 million were turned away. Very few are actually slipping in undetected nowadays because the entire point is to walk up to Border Patrol and claim asylum. Which, hey, Biden just put a cap on.
He asserts Democrats want to abort babies at 8 and 9 months. Utterly absurd and is illegal in EVERY state. Again, a classic Trump misrepresentation, skewing words the Virginia gov said in relation to something. Classic Trump lie. It has a sliver of truth in it's origins, then he twists it.
Claims his China tarrifs brought in income. When in reality they cost the avg american family like $1,700-2,350 (from right wing think-tank)
Claims the only jobs Biden created were for illegal immigrants or bounce back from covid jobs. Not true, even if, like I said, a classic trump lie, there is a sliver of truth in that a lot of the jobs were bounce back jobs.
Still claims Biden indicted him. He didn't.
I gave the largest tax cut in history. Just not true at all.
I had the lowest taxes in history. Just not true, especially if counting income tax didn't' exist pre 1913.....
Trump claims he was who lowered insulin prices. Barely half true. He did a voluntary program of which basically only 1/3rd actually did. Biden made it mandatory and covered more types of Insulin.
We had no terror attacks under my administration. Not true. We had 2 ISIS inspired terrorist attacks in America during Trump. Like a dozen killed. And multiple other domestic terrorism cases his DOJ prosecuted.
He claimed Pelosi took full responsibility for Jan 6th in effort to push responsibility off himself. False. Pelosi said she took responsibility for not having Capital Police prepare more. A classic Trump skewing of truth.
We had the largest deficit in our country's history under Biden. That was the 2020 budget.... Trump's last budget in office.... Which is fair, he had to spend because of covid. STILL a lie.

There's literally a dozen plus more of these. Not all are bold faced lies, but most are. Let alone, the man has 30,000 plus documented lies online where you can literally reference every single one and it'll show you when/where he said it. Many are the same lie, over and over and over again. But it's still 30k plus.
